text:
Salmeen Adam Salmeen AL Balushi 
Personal Details

 Nationality: Omani

Objective
 A young and ambitious fresh graduate is aspiring to be enrolled in a 
dynamic and a highly reputable organization to achieve the desired growth in his
skill set, knowledge and career. Furthermore, making sure that my job position 
serves the company in a very efficient and effective way and working on results -
oriented tasks to achieve the objectives of the organization and personal career 
goals.

Kingdom 2016
 - High school secondary certificate, 12th grade from AL Ameer high school UAQ 
2012

skills, Proactive
 - Excellent interpersonal and communication skills (Written & Verbal), Email 
writing skills
 - Problem- solving, Teamwork, ability to meet strict deadlines and thriving under
pressure
 - Time management, Fast learner, Adaptability and Flexibility, Attention to detail
 - Customer service orientation, Hard worker, Self- motivated, Self- disciplined, 
Organised

 English: Reading, Writing, Speaking
